sentences.english: Who Goes?What Goes on at Bathhouses?
sentences.chinese: 誰去以及去浴池做什麼？

sentences.english: The Huaqing Pool became famous not just because it was an imperial bathing pool.
sentences.chinese: 這華清池可不光因爲是皇家浴池纔出名的。

sentences.english: I climbed into the bath and I could feel the eels nibbling my body.
sentences.chinese: 我爬進浴池，能感覺到一羣黃鱔在輕咬我的身體。

sentences.english: She soaked a while longer in the bath before finally getting out and towelling off.
sentences.chinese: 她在浴池中又泡了一會兒，然後出來擦乾了身體。

sentences.english: Taking a shower really turns the bathroom into a swimming pool.
sentences.chinese: 淋浴一次，真的能把盥洗間變成浴池。

sentences.english: They stay in rooms with Jacussis, circular leather couches, wide-screen televisions, and views of the beach.
sentences.chinese: 他們住的地方有按摩浴池，環行的真皮沙發。

sentences.english: Free baths opened by ARA in Ufa.
And where do you spend a lot of time everyday? In the bathroom!
sentences.chinese: 每天你會在哪兒呆上一段時間，在浴池裏。

sentences.english: Indeed, Emperor Li Longji's pool is much bigger.
sentences.chinese: 果然是皇帝李隆基自己用的浴池，就是大。

sentences.english: In turkey men and women have bath together, and men choose their brides in the public bathhouse.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其男女共浴，男人們可以在公共浴池挑選新娘。

sentences.english: This is the hot spring bathing pool Li Longji gave his concubine Yang Yuhuan.
sentences.chinese: 這就是李隆基送給妃子楊玉環的溫泉浴池。

sentences.english: The first floor bath, second floor hotel Fanzhuang, in private.
sentences.chinese: 一樓浴池，二樓旅館飯莊，有雅座。

sentences.english: The Little Mermaid is sitting in the waterline of the harbor bath exactly as she is in Copenhagen harbor.
sentences.chinese: 小美人魚坐在港口浴池水邊，就像她在哥本哈根港口。

definition: to bathe/to immerse oneself in a warm bath
pond/bathhouse pool/dance floor of a ballroom/(old) stalls (front rows in a theater)
